result.execSummary:
The defendant Marcell J Smith was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possession of THC, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(e).
  • Possess/Illegally Obtained Prescription, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 450.11(7)(h).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: Milwaukee County Clerk of Circuit Court

supervisions.notes: BOTH COUNTS: Pay all applicable costs and surcharges and supervision fees by 12-22-17 or civil judgment will be entered WITH tax intercept.
Concurrent with: Count 3; with credit for 3 days time served
Concurrent with: Count 2; with credit for 3 days time served

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Marcell J Smith

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Marcell J Smith in court with attorney Kimberley Motley.  David T. Malone appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  sdg

Statements made as to sentencing by State, Defense and Defendant.  Additional statements by:  CHARISSIA S.

AS TO COUNT 2:

Defendant sentenced to serve THREE (3) DAYS in the House of Correction with credit for THREE (3) DAYS time served.  CONCURRENT TO COUNT 3.  TIME SERVED DISPOSITION.

AS TO COUNT 3:

Defendant sentenced to serve THREE (3) DAYS in the House of Correction with credit for THREE (3) DAYS time served.  CONCURRENT TO COUNT 2.  TIME SERVED DISPOSITION.

OTHER CONDITIONS:

* Defendant to pay all applicable costs and surcharges, and supervision fees BY 12-22-2017 or CIVIL JUDGMENT will be entered WITH tax intercept.

Filed,
Notice of Right to Seek Post-conviction Relief;
Pre-trial Incarceration Credit.
Per request of the Defense,  matter is RESCHEDULED to 06-22-2016 at 03:00 pm.  sdg

Defendant Marcell J Smith in court with attorney Kimberley Motley who appeared by telehone.  Brad Alan Vorpahl appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  sdg

Hearing proceeded on the Record.  State RENEWED their request to REVOKE based upon the new charges issued.  Defense and Defendant did concede that there is a factual basis to REVOKE the DPA.  The defendant is not in compliance with the terms of the Deferred Prosecution Agreement.  Based upon the defendant's non-compliance, the court revoked the Deferred Prosecution Agreement; proceedings reinstated.  Court orders entry of judgment of conviction.  Sentencing hearing scheduled for June 15, 2016 at 03:00 pm.
JusticePoint DPA Progress Report.  Filed, sdg.

Defendant Marcell J Smith in court with attorney Kimberley Motley who appeared by telephone.  David T. Malone appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  sdg

Review hearing proceeded on the Record.  Defendant has completed his letter of apology,  assessment fee and Community Service.  State advised that Defendant has picked up a new case in Racine County.  Based upon new the new case,  State moved to REVOKE the DPA.  Defense requested that Defendant be allowed to continue on the DPA in this County.  Court held colloquy with the Defendant.  Court takes the motion to REVOKE under ADVISEMENT at this time.  Defense requested more time to discuss with the District Attorney's office.  Court ordered matter adjourned to Br. 33 for Review.  Review hearing scheduled for April 18, 2016 at 08:30 am.
JusticePoint DPA Progress Report.  Filed, sdg.
JusticePoint DPA Non-compliance Report.  Filed, sdg.

Defendant Marcell J Smith in court with attorney Kimberley Motley who appeared by telephone.  David T. Malone appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  sdg

Hearing proceeded on the Record.  State advised that Defendant needs to produce more negative tests.  Court ordered matter adjourned to Br. 33 for Review.  Review hearing scheduled for April 4, 2016 at 08:30 am.
JusticePoint DPA Progress Report.  Filed, sdg.
From Defendant to the Court.  Filed, sdg.

Defendant Marcell J Smith in court with attorney Kimberley Cy. Motley who appears via telephone.  Brad Alan Vorpahl appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  sdg

Based upon the defendant's compliance with Deferred Prosecution Agreement, matter is adjourned for final review hearing in Branch 33.  Attorney Motley is authorized to appear via telephone at the next date.  Review hearing scheduled for February 15, 2016 at 08:30 am.
JusticePoint DPA Progress Report.  Filed, sdg.

Defendant Marcell J Smith in court with attorney Kimberley Cy. Motley by telephone.  David T. Malone appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
Based upon the defendant's compliance with Deferred Prosecution Agreement, matter is adjourned for final review hearing in Branch 33.  Review hearing scheduled for December 14, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Marcell J Smith in court with attorney Kimberley Cy. Motley.  Paul Hauer on behalf of Brandon A Wigley appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Deputy Court Clerk: tmk.

AS TO COUNT 2 and 3:
Parties are prepared to enter into a deferred prosecution agreement.
Defendant was advised of constitution rights and maximum penalties, waived all rights and entered a plea of GUILTY.  Defendant examined as to the plea.  Plea Questionnaire/Waiver of Rights, Addendum  and Elements/Jury Instructions, received and filed.  Stipulation by parties to complaint as a factual basis to sustain the guilty plea.  Defendant further advised that if he is not a US citizen deportation is possible.  Court found the defendant guilty as charged in the Information.  Court WITHHELD entry of judgment of conviction.  Deferred Prosecution Agreement received, signed and filed.  Court ordered case adjourned for review hearing in Branch 33.  Review hearing scheduled for September 1, 2015 at 03:00 pm.

Attorney Kimberley Cy. Motley in court via telephone.  Paul Hauer on behalf of Brandon A Wigley appeared for the State of Wisconsin. 
Deputy Court Clerk: tmk.
Held off the record. Case set for projected plea and sentencing. Prior to today's proceedings defense counsel contacted the court request an adjournment. Defendat Marcell Smith appeared via telephone after the case was addressed to get new date. Case adjourned for projected plea and sentencing on 08-03-2015 promptly at 8:30 am.   Parties notified that effective August 1, 2015, Branch 17 will be located in the Safety Building, room 310. If plea is not entered on 08-03-2015 at 8:30 am, parties are to appear for status conference with co-defendant case 15CF1956 on 08-13-2015 at 8:30am, to track together.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for August 3, 2015 at 08:30 am.  Status conference scheduled for August 13, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Defense counsel requests an adjouned plea and sentencing hearing via telephone. Defense counsel and Defendant to call court on 07-29-2015 at 1:30 pm, as this is matter is to tag along with co-defendant case, for scheduling purposes. Plea and sentencing hearing remains scheduled for 07-29-2015 at 1:30 pm. Case scheduled for Projected plea and sentencing hearing scheduled for 08-03-2015 at 8:30 am.

Defendant Marcell J Smith in court with attorney Kimberley Cy. Motley appear via telephone.  Paul Hauer on behalf of Brandon A Wigley appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Deputy Court Clerk: tmk.
 Court orders case for adjourned projected Plea and Sentencing on 07-29-2015 at 01:30 pm, Branch 17.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for July 29, 2015 at 01:30 pm.
State's Motion to Join for Trial, received and filed. tk

Defendant Marcell J Smith in court with attorney Kimberley Cy. Motley appearing via telephone.  Danielle Chojnacki for Brandon Wigley appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defense counsel was recently retained and requested a scheduling conference date.  Court granted the defense request for an additional scheduling date and will allow defense counsel to appear via telephone on the next court date (defense counsel to call the Court at 8:30 on that date). Court ordered that any motions be filed by the next court date. Case adjourned to Branch 17.  Scheduling conference scheduled for July 2, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Marcell J Smith in court with attorney Lisa M. Procaccio, as a friend of the court.  Paul M. Hauer appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Deputy Court Clerk: tmk.
Case set for pretrial conference. Defendant does not qualify for public defender representation. Defendant request additonal time to retain a private attorney. Case adjourned for status of counsel.  Status conference scheduled for June 15, 2015 at 01:30 pm.
Oral, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with Manuel C.
Court ordered no use of controlled substances unless valid prescription.

Defendant Marcell J Smith in court.  Brandon A Wigley appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defendant is advised that this case is assigned to Judge Stark, Branch 17. Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.   Defendant received a copy of the complaint and was advised of right to counsel.   Defendant does not qualify for Public Defender representation.  Court entered a plea of not guilty on behalf of the Defendant. Court reserves Defendant's right to file a substitution of judge pursuant to Sec. 971.20 until Defendant's next scheduled court appearance.  Case is adjourned for a Pretrial Conference in Branch 17.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for May 20, 2015 at 08:30 am.
SUMMONS MAILED. DEFENDANT ORDERED INTO ROOM 221 SAFETY BUILDING ON 05-11-2015 at 01:30pm
